Academic.description: Programmer Analyst will be able to develop planning, acquisition, compilation, classification, and integration tasks of the information that makes up a system, including hardware and communications, as well as to select the programming paradigm from which to focus the construction processes of software.

experience.jobDescription: Develop new products in Angular 11 for logistic tracking. Integration with i18n, Google Maps, Social Networks sing in, and Chart js libraries. Collaborating closely with backend team and designers. Active participation in product decisions. Working with APIs for data consumption.

Taking part as freelancer in the development of a Smart City Dashboard. Write well-designed, efficient code by using best software development practices.  Integration with i18n, Google Maps, and Chart js libraries. API consuming.

Develop Angular App writing efficient code. Integration with backend. API consuming. Collaborate with other team members and stakeholders. Magento e-Commerce site maintenance. Bulk product loading and monthly and special dates website updates. Catalog management (prices and catalog rules). Collaborate in some custom modules development.
